https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kftYEZy05yuHMzz5ABJ8g7RdQWb.jpg In 1941, Hong Kong was the Casablanca of the East, a city full of war refugees, profiteers and spies. With the sudden attack by Japanese troops, a Canadian soldier's Christmas promise is broken during the Battle of Hong Kong. Christmas at the Royal Hotel
